func.title: GetChar

param.name: text
param.desc: String of which to get a character.

param.name: index
param.desc: Position of the character. The first character is at position 0. If the specified position is outside the string, nil is returned.

func.desc: Determines the ASCII character code of a character in a string.
func.remark: Format("%c") can be used to convert the character to a string.

example.text: Gets the first character of the name of the first player.
